intro: Malouetia asiatica, commonly known as the Asian malouetia, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. The fruit is a small, fleshy capsule that contains several seeds.
